original_text: (Now the people of Benjamin heard that the people of Israel had gone up to Mizpah.) And the people of Israel said, “Tell us, how did this evil happen?”
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 미스바에 올라간 것을 베냐민 자손이 들었더라 이스라엘 자손이 이르되 이 악한 일이 어떻게 일어났는지 우리에게 말하라 하니

sentences.original_text: Now the people of Benjamin heard
that the people of Israel had gone up to Mizpah.
And the people of Israel said,
